verses.name: Job 31:7
verses.text: If my step hath turned out of the way, and mine heart walked after mine eyes, and if any blot hath cleaved to mine hands;

verses.name: Job 31:8
verses.text: Then let me sow, and let another eat; yea, let my offspring be rooted out.

verses.name: Job 31:9
verses.text: If mine heart have been deceived by a woman, or if I have laid wait at my neighbour’s door;

verses.name: Job 31:10
verses.text: Then let my wife grind unto another, and let others bow down upon her.

verses.name: Job 31:11
verses.text: For this is an heinous crime; yea, it is an iniquity to be punished by the judges.
